_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The four bases of psychic power [sn51.12: The basis of psychic power that has immersion due to enthusiasm and active effort
The basis of psychic power that has immersion due to energy
The basis of psychic power that has immersion due to mental development
The basis of psychic power that has immersion due to inquiry and active effort
Perceiving continuity [sn51.12:4.1]: as by day, so by night
as by night, so by day
The many kinds of psychic power (a repet: Multiplying themselves and becoming one again
Controlling the body as far as the BrahmƒÅ realm
The realization of freedom [sn51.12:4.1]: Realizing the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life
Living having realized it with their own insight due to the ending of defilements.
